title: Cannot recover my account
body:
I didn't log into my main League account for about 6 months and when I tried it said my password was incorrect.

I requested a password change and no e-mail was sent. I noticed I stopped receiving e-mails from Riot months ago.

I just get automated responses from their support team with little to no help at all.


Has my account gone inactive or has it been compromised (stolen)? I don't know how to recover it.

replies.body: Hmmmmm there's a pretty decent chance that your account might have been compromised if the password and email were changed without you knowing. Reach out to our account team by selecting "I need help recovering my account" in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help you secure and repair that account for ya ^_^!
